publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4870 Donald Gorrie on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Motions and decisions—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 4th Report 2006, (Session 2), Motions and decisions (SP Paper 589) and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 6 October 2006.

S2M-4870 Donald Gorrie on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Motions and decisions—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 4th Report 2006, (Session 2), Motions and decisions (SP Paper 589) and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 6 October 2006.
S2M-4870 Motions and decisions (lodged on 26 September 2006) Karen Gillon*
